info.name: Darker GirlsAskGuys (G@G)
info.description: Darker GirlsAskGuys (G@G) style since only official style is very bright.
info.additionalInfo:
Consider this more like a BETA than anything else for now. There is more or less bugs and things to improve but since it's usable already, I'm releasing it now and will continue to update it from time to time so remember to check for updates occasionally.

If you have bug reports or want to ask something, use the feedback section below OR PM me @ G@G, username cerebrum. NOTE: check the "known issues list" before reporting something I already know about. I don't guarantee anything when it comes to bug fixing or improvements but I will work on this when I have a spare moment.



v0.1.0 Changelog and Known Issues
Initial release!

Click "Show CSS Code" button to see list of current known issues and my to-do list.
